desmoj.core.exception

Class InterruptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • desmoj.core.exception.InterruptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedInterruptException

    public class InterruptException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    InterruptExceptions can be caught when processes are interrupted. They contain an InterruptCode which is used to provide the interrupted processes with information about the reason for their interruption.
    See Also:
    InterruptCode, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InterruptException(InterruptCode interruptCode)
      Constructs an InterruptException containing the given InterruptCode.
